short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to organize other extensions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:-
- Group Extensions By Categories
- Drag and Drop support to easily move extensions across categories
- Enable/Disable any installed extension
- Sync data across all devices
